targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" = 'balena' AND "name" = 'mmcblk0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" = 'black-pearl' AND "name" = 'mmcblk0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" = 'rancher' AND "name" = 'mmcblk0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" = 'raspberrypi' AND "name" = 'mmcblk0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" = 'balena' AND "name" = 'mmcblk0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
